title: Library Show & Tell (rebroadcast) / National & Competitive Intelligence
teaser: USF Students interested in executive positions, whether in business or government, are encouraged to take part in a program in “National and Competitive Intelligence.” The program, which is backed by a grant from the Office of the Director of National Intelligence, helps students learn such skills as information gathering, analysis and presentation. We’ll hear from the program’s director and a participant on this week’s University Beat on WUSF 89.7.
